text: For 4:3 we have spent enough of our … doing 47% ¦ you have spent enough of your … doing ANT BYZ HF PCK 41.5% ¦ enough … has been spent doing CT 11.2%we have spent enough of our 4:3 life ¦ time CT PCKlife doing what the Gentiles want to do, walking in sensual indulgences, evil desires, excesses of wine, revelries, drinking bouts, and illicit idolatries.
